CustomField.description: This checkbox governs the User's ability to generate and release Billing Events for Projects belonging to specified Regions/Practices/Groups, and to edit Billing-related fields (Billed checkbox and Billing Event Item) for Resources' business records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox governs the User's ability to generate and release Billing Events for Projects belonging to specified Regions/Practices/Groups, and to edit Billing-related fields (Billed checkbox and Billing Event Item) for Resources' business records.
CustomField.label: Billing
